policy_paragraphs: Illinois Institute of Technology expects all students to finalize their registration of courses in accordance with university deadlines. In extreme circumstances, a late registration request can be submitted for review to the student's academic advisor, course instructor, and, if applicable, department chair.

Students who wish to request late registration must complete the Late Registration Request, including all pertinent information, found on the Registrar - Student Resources page of the Illinois Tech Portal during the late registration period of the current term. For any questions, please contact the Office of the Registrar at registrar@illinoistech.edu or 312.567.3100.
Please note that the late registration period will begin the day after the add/drop deadline and last for one week each academic semester. Please refer to the Academic Calendar for dates.
